Module com.marinescu.fxmoney
Package com.marinescu.fxmoney.Model

Class Loan

java.lang.Object
com.marinescu.fxmoney.Model.Loan
public class Loan extends Object
This class represents a loan requested by a client.

  • Constructor Details

    • Loan

      public Loan(javafx.beans.property.SimpleIntegerProperty id, javafx.beans.property.SimpleIntegerProperty client, javafx.beans.property.SimpleDoubleProperty startBalance, javafx.beans.property.SimpleDoubleProperty remainingBalance, javafx.beans.property.SimpleDoubleProperty currentPayment, javafx.beans.property.SimpleIntegerProperty penalty, javafx.beans.property.SimpleIntegerProperty monthsNumber, javafx.beans.property.SimpleStringProperty dateApproved, javafx.beans.property.SimpleStringProperty lastPaymentDate, javafx.beans.property.SimpleStringProperty dueDate)
      This method is the class' controller. It creates a new loan with its attributes.
      Parameters:
      id - The loan's id.
      client - The client who requested the loan.
      startBalance - The requested amount.
      remainingBalance - The amount left to pay.
      currentPayment - The payment amount in the current month.
      penalty - The sum of penalties.
      monthsNumber - Loan repayment period in months.
      dateApproved - The date the loan was accepted.
      lastPaymentDate - The date on which the last payment was made.
      dueDate - The date until which the loan can be returned.
